name: Shattered (itch) (Teldon_darv, Blackcatninja, Jamesmello, Pablohrdz)
description:
In this top-down puzzle game, you play as a skeleton who has awoken from his eternal slumber in his own basement. After having lower back pain for nearly a decade, his only desire is to rest in the comfort of his old bed once more.  However,  he must avoid his old dogs, who have been waiting for a long time for a huge treat and who would be more than happy to savor their master's bones!

Developed in accordance to the theme "Intentionally Broken" for the Seattle Indies November Game Jam, 2019.
